mean_cn: n. 妇女紧身褡；腰带；  v. 围，包围，环绕
mean_en: a tight piece of clothing worn especially in the past by women under other clothes to make the area around the waist look thinner
sentence: Wearing a girdle can make you look thinner.
sentence_trans: 穿上紧身褡能让你看起来更瘦一点。
word_etyma: gird束缚 ＋ le表示做某种动作时所使用的东西 → girdle带，腰带
